Class CaveObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Geometry.Rect
      • Sprite
        • CaveObstacle

  • public class CaveObstacle
extends Sprite
    2/4/17 Extends sprite. Provides methods to tick a custom sprite that also has specialized collision functions (e.g. triangles). Can draw triangles and store a color.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CaveObstacle.Chunk
      "Chunks" are the objects that make the floor/ceiling of the cave rough and bumpy.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        2/4/17 Overwrites the default rectangle that Sprite draws. This draws a triangle, and the position of the tip of the triangle depends on the value of this.l.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Sprite
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object to draw to

      • tick

        public void tick(double hg_speed)
        2/4/17 Ticks the stalagtite based on the hang glider's speed. To be called en masse when ticking the map in general. Will eventually host collision tests

      • collide_as_triangle

        public boolean collide_as_triangle(Geometry.Rect r)
        Collides the triangle with a rectangle. Uses the collide point method with every single point of a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        r - Geometry.Rect, used for its 4 corners
        Returns:
        boolean, true if colliding, false if not
